cause.description:
Want to Make a Difference by Supporting STLF? Your support can be an investment in the life of a young person. The best part is, students are living commitments to service and 'paying it forward' in their own lives, schools, communities, and families. Here's how your support can help:
* $45 - Breakfast for 40 students on a Pay It Forward Tour. * $140 - Dinner for 40 students on a Tour. * $280 - Full Need-based Scholarship for a student on a High School PIF Tour. * $425 - Full Need-based Scholarship for a student on a College PIF Tour. * $7,500 - Full High School PIF Tour (5 Days) for up to 35 under-resourced High School Students from several Alternative Schools in Minneapolis and St. Paul.
1. promoting initiative and living with passion...believing one student can make a difference
cause.mission: Revealing leadership through service, relationships, and action
cause.name: Students Today Leaders Forever (STLF)
